name: Gastly

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Energy Conversion
attacks.text: Put up to 2 Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. Gastly does 10 damage to itself.

flavorText: A mysterious Pokémon. Some say it is a lifeform from another dimension, while others believe it is formed from smog.

strengths: Energy Conversion recovers energy from discard
50 HP is good for a Basic
weaknesses: Needs to evolve to be effective
counters: Aggressive attackers that KO before evolution

competitiveHistory: Fossil Gastly was the preferred Gastly for Gengar decks due to its Energy Conversion attack which provided energy recovery utility. The no weakness and free retreat made it superior to Base Set Gastly. Energy Conversion helped recover discarded energy, making it useful for the discard-heavy format.

rulings.ruling: Energy Conversion retrieves ANY type of Energy cards, not just Psychic.
You may choose to retrieve 0, 1, or 2 Energy cards with Energy Conversion.
Gastly takes the 10 damage even if you retrieve 0 Energy cards.
